title: Xamarin.iOS => 1.68.3 to 2.80.2 => error HE0046: Failed to install the app '...' on the device 'iOS 14.5 (18E182) - iPhone 12 Pro': Unable To Install ???...???
body:
**Description**

After upgrading my Xamarin.iOS project to the last version of SkiaSharp, I cannot deploy anymore my app to the simulator

**Expected Behavior**

I can have my application deployed normally on my iOS simulator with 1.68.3 and all running nomally.

**Actual Behavior**

Just after upgraded to 2.80.2, the application cannot be deployed anymore like describe by the title.

I downgrade to the 1.68.3 and all come back to normal.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  1.68.3
- IDE:  VS2019 16.10.1 on Windows 10 20H2 19042.1052, on the Mac Mini : 
- Platform Target Frameworks: .NETStandard 2.1
- iOS:  VS For Mac 8.10.1 (build 71) / XCode 12.5 (12E262)
- Target Devices:   iPhone 12 Pro iOS 14.5 (simulator)
  
<details>
VS2019 on Windows :
